items.title: Nginx/Apache SSL Certificates with Let's Encrypt
items.summary: Certbot is a free, open source software tool for automatically using Let’s Encrypt certificates on manually-administrated websites to enable HTTPS.

items.title: Chocolatey, the package manager for Windows
items.summary: Chocolatey has the largest online registry of Windows packages. Chocolatey packages encapsulate everything required to manage a particular piece of software into one deployment artifact by wrapping installers, executables, zips, and/or scripts into a compiled package file.

items.title: IIS Express 10 localhost SSL certificate reset
items.summary: Tutorial on how to reset your localhost SSL certificate for IIS Express 10.

items.title: IIS SSL Certificates with Let's Encrypt
items.summary: win-acme is a ACMEv2 client for Windows that aims to be very simple to start with, but powerful enough to grow into almost every scenario.

items.title: Contact
items.summary: Get in touch with Steff.

items.title: Aarixa
items.summary: At aariXa, I worked extensively with a versatile tech stack, including Angular, .NET Core, MS SQL, Azure, and Windows Server, combining modern frameworks and Microsoft-centric technologies to deliver innovative solutions.

items.title: Bridgestone
items.summary: As a consultant at CTG, I contributed to a project for Bridgestone, focusing on the customization and enhancement of their Dynamics 365 CRM system.

items.title: Codefined
items.summary: At Codefined, I specialized in developing custom .NET and Angular web applications tailored to meet client-specific requirements.

items.title: Fuzed
items.summary: At Fuzed (previously known as Codefined), I contribute in developing an innovative, cloud-based ERP system tailored for the food production industry.

items.title: Intro
items.summary: I'm a passionate developer with a strong focus on web development and DevOps. I thrive on learning and working with the latest technologies and frameworks to continuously grow my expertise.

items.title: Experience
items.summary: My work experience, acquired certificates and education.

I'm a passionate developer with a strong focus on web development and DevOps. I thrive on learning and working with the latest technologies and frameworks to continuously grow my expertise. I enjoy collaborating as part of a team in an agile environment, where I can contribute to building impactful solutions. I'm detail-oriented, committed to getting things right, and understand that even the smallest details can make a big difference.

items.title: Nginx/Apache SSL-certificaten met Let's Encrypt
items.summary: Certbot is een gratis, open source tool om automatisch Let's Encrypt-certificaten te gebruiken op handmatig beheerde websites om HTTPS te activeren.

items.title: Chocolatey, de package manager voor Windows
items.summary: Chocolatey heeft het grootste online register van Windows-packages. Chocolatey-packages bevatten alles wat nodig is om een bepaald stuk software te beheren in één distributiebestand, door installatiescripts, uitvoerbare bestanden, zipbestanden en/of scripts te bundelen in een gecompileerd package.

I'm a passionate developer with a strong focus on web development and DevOps. I thrive on learning and working with the latest technologies and frameworks to continuously grow my expertise. I enjoy collaborating as part of a team in an agile environment, where I can contribute to building impactful solutions.
